description.en-US: A base recipe for recording attendance at events. (v0.0.1)

Indicates the actor caused an event (e.g. a meeting) to be paused or put on hold.
        It is expected (but not required) that the event will be resumed at a future point in time.

Contains an Agent or Group object representing an agent or group who observed
        the experience
ISO 8601 timestamp representing the planned start time of a scheduled or planned event.
ISO 8601 duration representing the planned duration of a scheduled or planned event.
